text:
If you've been to a Fatburger before, you know what to expect.

The food is on par with every other restaurant in the chain that I've visited, which is to say incredibly greasy and fattening --the way an item named "Fatburger" should be.

I've never had a bad experience here, but it could stand to be a little cleaner and the food is still only a notch above standard fast food fare.

Its the worst burger i ever had, the meat was so dry and salty, Service was slow, the place is so dirty.and top of that you pay almost $12 fir a burger you're expecting to be a good one but its very disappointing.. I never recommend this place

went in to try their famous XXXL burger, their soda machine was down so they were offering can sodas and promised free refills with the soda purchase, asked for another can of soda and the cashier was like annoyed by me for asking, they messed up my order and put all kinds of things on it that I did not ask for, every bite was smothered in mustard and relish. the 3 employees were like hiding in the back you'd have to wait a while before anyone would come to the counter for anyone needing help. horrible service extremely dirty restrooms that appeared to not have been cleaned up for a long time.

The burger and fries completely blew me away. The quality of food was just way above what my expectations were when I walked in. However, I did come to this location on a Saturday to try it out and ended up just walking out since I saw 6 people sitting down at tables but told me I had to get in line behind them. Yes, these people were sitting down because they did not get their order in standing up. One guy even had his feet on a chair. Seeing that made me realize that I was better off going somewhere else. Not sure if they were understaffed but it appears they were overwhelmed with a few customers that they couldn't get to anyone else.

The day I did go, the staff had fun while working with each other but they seemed fairly aloof and detached in regards to customer service and interaction.

The food was so good, I'm willing to try another location. But I felt like I was being treated by McDonalds or Walmart employees while here.

I'm not sure what more one could want if a fat burger with the works, American cheese, bacon and a fried egg doesn't do it for you.  I can tell you that's the only way to go.  Add a chocolate shake if you game.

Very fresh burgers . You can really tell they made it all fresh just for you. Little pricey but fresh ingredients ain't cheap. 
Burger on point .

Better than most other burger places in the area. I actually prefer them over Five Guys. They brought the food I ordered on time, the burger was cooked to perfection, well done and not missing anything I asked for. Very friendly service and the girls who work at the cashiers provide a cool atmosphere to the place which makes it even better. I highly recommend eating here!

Wow my first review. It's about 10 dollars for a 8oz burger and a small drink at this fast food place. I have a few problems with that. It's not fast. It's expensive for what you get. And you would think if you are the only customer in the place at 4:30 am they could pay enough attention to at least not get your order completely wrong. No wonder I have not been here in months, and won't ever be back again .

Great food. Worst service of all time.  They rarely get it right. Root Beer float ordered 3 times in 3 visits. Meal came without float twice got it 15 minutes later after asking. Once float came without meal. Had to request meal 15 minutes later.

When I feel like having a good old fashioned hamburger, this is where I go.  It's just a good, juicy hamburger, and they do it right.  Love that you have a choice between steak fries or skinny fries, and both are good.  Their chili is also decent, and goes well with their fries or on their burgers.  I like that they give you a list of everything they put on your burger, so that you can pick and choose.  Also, handmade milkshakes, yum.

This location is shitty. Just went there at 12:30 when they close at 2 am. They were out of hamburger buns and the soda machine was out of service yet she still took my order and let me pay. In the end I got a refund but I won't be returning.

My boyfriend and I came to this location for lunch because I remembered LOVING fat burger when I was a kid. When we walked in and I went on yelp and saw all the bad reviews. I thought "whatever I'm sure it'll be fine" I thought wrong. We walk up to order and the cashier was having problems with her register, no big deal. After I had finished ordering and was about to pay I asked for no pickles and relish and she got flustered because she didn't know how to go back on her POS, and said she would just let the cook know herself. We sat down and waited probably 25 minutes for your food... THE PLACE WAS EMPTY! After we got our burger I looked and there was relish and pickles on it. I took it back to the woman who had taken out order and she replies, "oh yea you're right, so you want a new burger?" DUH! After waiting another 15-20 minutes for a new one it came out with cheese that I did NOT ask for. At this point I was over the top angry. I haven't ever asked for a full refund before but there was no way I was spending my money on this service. I asked for a refund and the fry cook and cashier got an attitude with me. The casher then refunded me for the burger only and not the fries. I had to show her my receipt and she said, "oh you want me to refund the fries too?" She refunded me the fries and we got the hell out of there. I will NEVER go back again.

This place sucks. Do not eat here. Horrible customer service. Got my order wrong, said it was to go and the lady served me my burger as I was waiting like I said it for there. Forgot to give me my cup. There was barely any one in there as it is. Burgers sucked. Worst $20 I've spent on food. Go to In-N-Out instead cheaper and so much better.
My first and last try. I think the meat is tasteless and the tomato was almost green,  Enough said!

When it takes 25 minutes to make 2 milk shakes to go that's a problem. The cashier didn't seem to happy when I ordered 2 chocolate milkshakes and said "there's 2 milkshakes ahead of you so" I mean what the heck? How long does it take to make a milkshake that is the same as Baskin Robbins. Maybe have more than 1 staff member working at this location if it's going to take over 20 minutes to make 2 milkshakes.

Apparently they have new owners and want to charge for everything individually.  Bring the cost of a reg fat burger meal to over $13.  Yea sorry fat burger your dreaming of you think you can charge that for your burgers with 5 guys right across the street.  Fat burger you FIRED!  I doubt this location and its owners will be here very long. Bye Felicia !  5GUYS HERE I COME

Good burger served with lukewarm fries. Service is good but a bit slow when comparing to in n out or even 5 guys. Beef just above average, barely. Maybe it was an off day, willing to try again some time soon.

Food is made fresh in front you, cashier Elizabeth friendly and trying her best to keep staff together. Not sure if they decides to train two new employees today (fries and shakes) but these two have no experience working in a fast paced environment. Wandering around or attempting to accomplish their tasks as slow as possible. Had three parties leave before their orders were completed or taken. Current observation is that both of the new employees are somehow both occupying the fryer.

What did you do to my FATBURGER! This was, for years, my go to place for a great burger, great service, and ambiance. What happened!?

The last three times I've been here have been horrible. Two times ago, we were the only people in the place and there wasn't a clean table to be found. We had to ask someone to clean a table. A guy comes out with a dirty rag (smelled like dirty dishwater) and smeared the table "clean" and left with an attitude. Haven't seen him again, but still. After that, we've ordered takeout.

Last two times the service was TERRIBLE. Last night OVER THIRTY FIVE minutes to get three burgers and we were the only ones there. Now, that would be fine (it's not fast food) except they made our shakes first and they were all ruined before we even got our food. It's TAKEOUT! Are we supposed to drink our shakes before we leave? I guess I have to take the whole family with me to pick up our food, not sit down at the filthy table, drink our shakes at the counter while we wait over a half hour for a burger where the bread was hard, the meat was over cooked and the guy behind the counter looked like he wanted to be ANYWHERE else. If you're the owner of this Fatburger, please GET YOUR ASS IN THERE and straighten these guys out. Better yet, get the old guys back. You know? When your place had good service. So extremely disappointed.

I love Fatburger...that being said, this location is awful. Somehow they have been able to hire the most inept and incompetent people on the planet. 3 people in line when i walked in...took close to 15 minutes to order. When I did order I had to repeat my order 4 times so that the girl could slowly enter it into the computer. It seemed like the only person who knew what was going on was the poor manager who was running around working the grill, fries, and register when the girl had a question every 35 seconds. The other 2 employees may have well just gone home. It pains me to see a place that has the potential to make such amazing burgers be butchered like this. All i can think of is..and they want $15/hr?? Ha!!

If I could give them zero stars I would.  Fatburger has great food. That being said, this location is horrible.  They can't get an order correct and the fries are always burnt to a crisp.  Customer service is nonexistent and they have an "oops" attitude when they forget food in your order or give you someone else's order.  Don't waste your money or time. Go to a different location.
The service isn't the fastest but the food is great and they have never screwed up any of my orders like other fast food places.

Went by tonight because I was craving a burger....arrived at 9:14pm...mind you, they are still supposed to be open at this very moment according to the time as the door clearly stated 10:00pm ( I even checked online to see what time they closed to be sure) and the red open sign was still on which is why I went inside. However, when I walked in, there was a gentleman at the grill wiping it, lights were dimmed and chairs put up. I asked if they are already closed and he replied almost,I then asked if I could order something since it was only 15 after 9 and they are not due to close till 10pm.. instead of responding he turns and goes to the back....So I waited (mainly just to see if he was going to come back or wait, hoping I would leave) he then comes back out about 3 minutes later and I ask the same question...then I ask to speak to a manager he points to the a wall and says you can call.  I said what is the manager's and is there a number or card....he replies no...I again ask for the manager's name and he replied Eduardo.  I said, I saw another employee in the back when I walked in can I speak to him. The 2nd employee comes out and tells me he was cleaning the bathrooms and he was the acting manager.  He nonchalantly apologized for the other reps behavior and asked if he could help me...Sir, you have turned off the lights, picked up all the chairs, turned off all the grills and have bathroom hands...what exactly is it that you think you can do for me at this point?  I am in complete shock at the lack of anything that this place of business had to offer me, which was nothing.  I then ask him for the manager's name and info, he says I am the manager, I then said, the other gentleman just said it was Eduardo, he then said, "Eduardo is the GM I am acting manager".  I said, "can I please have the GM's info please", he again stated, in his nonchalant manner, "he will be in tomorrow".  I know it's the holiday season and everyone is trying to get home to their families but if your sign says open and your doors are not locked and I walk in, don't ignore me, just hoping I will go away, that is just horrible!! NEVER AGAIN Fatburger!!!!!
So very, very, very dirty.  People were nice but disgusting EVERYWHERE! I honestly don't know how they're able to stay open.

First, I feel like I should defend Fatburger from those who complain about the price or the length of wait for the food.  Yes, a fatburger costs more than a Quarter Pounder or a Whopper, and yes it takes longer to get.  That's because (A) it's a thicker (fatter) burger with fresher ingredients, and (B) it hasn't been sitting under a heat lamp waiting for you to come in and order it.  A fatburger is cooked to order, so they are fresh.  Quality is a positive thing, even if you have to pay for it, or wait for it.

In my high school days, when I had a little extra to spend, I used to go to Fatburger with a group of friends and get some chili-cheese fries covered with diced onions and a chocolate milk shake made with real ice cream.  We would hang out in the lobby, listening to that great old time rock 'n' roll and classic soul that they always play.  Those were good times.

Now that I try to eat healthier, it's been a couple of years since I've had their chili cheese fries or milk shake, but I still go to Fatburger once in awhile just for their veggie burger.  Kudos to Fatburger for offering a healthy alternative to standard fast food fare.  (If only In-N-Out Burger would introduce a burger with a veggie patty).  Fatburger uses a substantial Boca patty in their veggie burgers, and it makes for a tasty, satisfying meal.  It's probably the only thing I'll ever order from Fatburger anymore, so it's a really smart way to keep people like me coming back.

Poor service! They took long and aren't even as busy as In and Out. 
The ignorant cashier with tats on her hands took my order repeated back my order several times after I clarified NO ONIONS. She kept saying everything? I had to consistently clarify NO ONIONS. She finally said ok.

After waiting 15 mins for my order, I drive home to take a bite into a saturated burger full of uncooked white onions!
I specifically said NO onions! I hate raw onions on burgers! 
So call to tell her she messed up on my order. All I was asking for was for them to remake it but she insisted on arguing to justify she's right. She only heard what she wanted to hear and didn't want to admit wrong. Again all I was calling for was to have them simply fix and remake my burger. She was just wasting my time and breathe. 
Clearly nothing was going to get handled over the phone.
She lacks good work ethics and has no understanding of customer service skills. 

I'm so annoyed. 10 min drive, 15 min wait, had to drive back and wait for her to refund my card. That's about 40 wasted mins of my life I'll never get back! 

Why go here and pay more for their bad service and greasy I've priced burgers when Smashburger and In and Out are down the street on Tropicana and Forte Pache?

I am not sure I was at the same place as the other reviewers. 
My experience was pretty darn good. 
The customer service was great. The place was clean. 
The burgers were fresh and tasty. The service was rather quick. They cook to order so I would think this may be why it takes a few extra minutes.

This Fat Burger is constantly good. I eat here often. clean, friendly... burgers are always juicy can always count on a good burger. My only complaint would be the sometimes rotten egg smelll in the restaurant. But the food is great!

Hello my name is Ocean Anders and I can't get that burger at exactly 12:15 PM and unbeknownst to me they had already closed hours before I had Yelp this particular location and found them to be open till 1 AM when I arrived at the destination they were fucking close. So if they say that there open till 1 am. They are lieing asswhole's

Ordered 5 sandwiches and fries. Got all the way home(5 miles) and missing a sandwich. My options were credit..pick it up or have my name put down for another time. So i am hungry and you screwed me over. So i drive the 10 mile round trip to pick up a cold fat burger and was handed a 10% coupon off my next visit. How nice of you too have us drive 20 miles for a place that smells like sewer..is far from clean and that 10% wow thats a little bit much for all you put my visting company from Michigan through?? I would expect this from McDonalds but not Fatburger.

NEVER AGAIN. Walked in with my boyfriend and didn't even get a hello. We stood at the cash register waiting to order for about 10 mins. Note, there was NO ONE in front of us. Three customers in the lobby. One lady sitting with her child and 2 others waiting for food. They messed up the lady and child's order. They took 30 mins to give the other people their to go order. One lady asked for a refund because she waited 30 mins to get ONE burger. They gave her the refund. The other lady is STILL waiting. No sure how long she was there. Finally the manager Manny took our order. He actually rolled his eyes at US for our choices that we put on our burger. I got my receipt, and looked at it and it turns out my order was wrong. I told him I didn't order an egg on my burger (which cost $2.00 to add on btw) He didn't offer a refund or anything, nor an apology. Finally, the other lady who was STILL waiting got her food gets her order. And guess what?! HER food was wrong too! They messed up 3 orders back to back, so I requested a refund. I ended up waiting for almost 30 mins as well. The manager then says I am waiting because my "burger has an egg on it," which I already told him that was incorrect. The girl in the back named Brittany started laughing. I told her it's not funny that you all have messed up 4 peoples food back to back and my total was $26.00. I actually have called Fatburger Corp. and spoke to the VP of Operations regarding this. I encouraged him to look at this yelp page to see how his store is doing.

The amount of late night spots that I am starting to Yelp, makes me thing I should create a list. Fatburger deserves a place at that table!

Having lived in SoCal for a number of years, and now, once again, Sin City, Fatburger is a staple for late night grub. The location on the strip is open 24/7 and is the perfect choice when you are trying to nurse yourself into zombie mode. I say that because, sometimes, Vegas can be too much fun, and you are near a coma-tose point. 

Being a Zombie would take some sort of miracle. Fatburger, can be that miracle.

On my way home from the club the other night, I got hungry. There really isn't too much in the way of convenience at 5am near my place (I can't wait to move to the Strip). Thankfully, this Fatburger location popped up like an oasis in the desert.

Feeling "healthy", I decided to order the Turkey Burger. With Bacon. Clearly, I wasn't in the right frame of mind, but whatever. It was late.

Yeah, it was delicious, amazing, and the whole nine yards but the reason I give this place Four Stars is simple. Convenience, speedy service, and a clean restaurant.

Done and done.

Discussed with their service!!!! They not only screwed out order. When we go home, the charges is for 4 cheese burgers and extra for cheese and only 1 person had cheese. We called and they acted like they could not understand what we were saying. They had the audacity to ask the person prepping the food of they forgot the cheese as if we were lying. Horrible establishment and will never go back!!!!!!!

This location was a fail for us.  The area isn't bad but the restaurant was pretty worn and smelled bad.  Customers were very rough.  We were called for our food and handed the waaayyyy wrong order.  We tried to tell the employee but they took off and ignored us for a while.  Finally got our correct order...Asked for no pickles and no onions.  Got onions and no relish but plenty of pickles.  I really like Fat Burger but this location may just need to be avoided.

A West coast original! Fat Burger is home of the biggest, juiciest, "slap your momma" (please don't slap your moma-she slaps back and your dad gets mad), burgers. 

One of the first minority owned chains, now around the world. From small to the massive XXXL( don't let your wife know you ordered one), the burgers are always fresh beef. Now, there is chicken and turkey, if you like vegetables. :)

Milk shakes are made from scooped ice cream! Yum.

Don't waste your time or money here at this location. Sincerely just order through Grubhub and it arrived with a driver who looked like he was high as a kite. So that is the first disappointment next beening the fact when I ate into my chicken sandwhich it was RAW! Upon calling the store itself I spoke with an unidentified worker claiming to be the manager. When I told her what had happened she said I could come in Yes drive to the place when I already ordered thru grubhub and tipped the driver, but you want me to drive 4 miles roundtrip for a chicken sandwhich? So NO! If my car wasn't dead I would have because I was intending on eating and being satisfied. Her suggestion was to then contact grubhub for a refund. The most frustrating aspect of it all is upon the conversation with the supposed manager she knew from my description of my burger which one it was but was only ready to remake it tonight at her convenience not the paying customers some management team you got! Anyways 86 that location Go To RedRock Casinos Fatburger waaaaaaaaaay better!

For starters i haven't had fat burger in a few years. I walked in the store and the pos system was down so they had to write my order down, I got the honey garlic crispy chicken and a side of onion rings the chicken was rubbery and I don't think it was cooked fully through because of the texture, way too much honey garlic sauce it made the chicken breading soggy or maybe that was because the meat wasn't cooked all they way either was it was a disgusting mess. The onion rings must have been cooked at a low temp in dirty oil because it was like an old nasty crunch and oily at the same time. I heard no sizzling coming from the fryers. I threw it all away and ate left over from the fridge. Thanks for a horrible experience. I used to love fat burger now I don't think I can ever eat there again. I'd give a half of a star if I could. Or none at all.

I had been interested in trying fatburger for a while. We came in at about 8 PM, the service was good, the guy working the register was cheerful. Overall a solid experience, although the burger should have been outstanding and it was not. Condiments were spot on, patty was not especially flavorful but still delicious. I can respect an establishment that doesn't freeze their meat. Bun was dry. I think if I had ordered some cheese it would have been better. 

Fries came out hot and were good, but not great. I figure if I can get a more satisfying burger and In N Out for half the price Fatburger as a franchise needs to try harder. 

Again, I thought the employees were friendly and knew what they were doing, just the food wasn't up to par.

Awful.  Place smells like garbage and the service is poor.  I could get over the garbage smell since I didn't eat there, but the burger just was just not very good.  Place was empty and the employees seemed annoyed that I came and they actually had to do their jobs. 

Fat burger used to be a place to grab an above average burger in my opinion, but this location defiantly is not.

The food and milkshake was good, but the manager was who really made the experience. He was cooking as well as making sure to talk to everyone that came in, and hand delivering each order with a smile. He really went out of his way to make sure everything was great which is rare in fast food chains. 

I just randomly stopped here as I live in another part of town, but I'm glad I did, and I'll make the drive to come back

Fatburger's been around Vegas for a while and had a reputation as the best burger in town for years. Recently they've been outclassed by SmashBurger and I can say there's not much reason to go back. The burgers are average and served with relish and lots of mayo which makes for an odd sweet taste. Fries taste about the same as those from the frozen section of the grocery store and are rather limp. 

This location had particularly bad service. Went in around 8 pm on a weeknight and there was only one staff member behind the counter, trying to fix a broken milkshake machine. Took about five minutes for other staff members to show up and even then they hung around the kitchen area. We had to wait for the first staff member to finish making milkshakes to help us and then he was incredibly unfriendly. On top of that there's no drive-thru.

If you're looking for a good burger in Vegas go to SmashBurger, or at the least In-N-Out. Avoid Fatburger.

Who's in charge here? Poor customer service over the phone. If you're busy say so. If you can't take an order over the phone, say so. Don't just hung up on people then not answer the phone. Way to lose clients.

Are burgers supposed to be crunchy? I guess that's why it took 20 minutes to cook. 
Also, the whole place smells like ass.

Seriously this place needs to have more people working, took 20 min for them to complete my Postmates order after arriving and I waited 15 min after it was placed. One burger and one fat fries 35 minutes wtf.

Went to this place for lunch with some friends, ordered the food to go.  Obviously they are in NO RUSH WHATSOEVER, even when you ask after 20 minutes where the food is.

There were maybe 2 or 3 orders ahead of us, and we all got basic burger combos.  We actually watched them make our hamburgers, and I'm pretty sure the cooks had never made one in their entire life -- or thought that if they stared at the patty long enough all of their problems would be answered.  THIS IS NOT GOURMET FOOD, THIS IS FAST FOOD.

Overall it took us half an hour from order to walking out the door.  No apologies even given.  Fries were done well before burgers, so they sat under a light IN FRONT OF US for most of the time.  Ridiculous.  Will NOT go back, and highly encourage the rest of you to NOT go.

Ordered the Impossible burger and paid 17$ for fries and the burger. 
Got it home to find out it was a bocca patty. WTH? 
I have bocca patties at home. I would pay that much for something I can make at ho e for a fraction of the cost. 
Oh and if you pay with credit card, the workers told us they don't get the tip if you write one in...only get to split the cash in the jar.

Just paid $14 for a turkey burger fries and soda. Could have gone to McDonald's.  Used to love this place.   Won't be back. Just by tasting one fry I can tell they haven't changed their oil in a long long time.

Please avoid this restaurant, always understaffed and food is not good.

First, when I ordered , lady rolled her eyes at me like I was messing up her day. Second, messed up and did not make my shakes. Also, they delivered the food in a tray when it was a to go order.

Once I tried the burgers, it was a real disappointment, sloppy and flavorless.

Definitely better burger joints in town.

Now I have eaten at several FatBurgers and this location has got to be the worst! My burger was the driest, thrown together burger I've ever had got home took 2 bites and was pissed!!! My fries were cold as ice! I will Never go back

Overpriced! You're better off going across the street to Five Guys  (you'll save quite a bit of money, too).  I'll admit that the shakes are good, but not good enough to pay almost twenty bucks for dinner for two!

Not impressive at all.

Im not one to write bad reviews, I firmly believe if you don't have anything nice to say don't say anything at all. But this needs to be said. 

I'm sitting here watching a man with scruffy grey facial hair cook. He has thrown down raw patties, cracked some raw eggs on the grill, built all of the burgers he was cooking and wrapped them up. He then proceeded to clean the grill and his station. 
Unfortunately, he still hasn't changed his gloves. He's just wiping his dirty gloves on his dirty apron. 
A couple approached the woman at the counter and let her know what they saw, because I'm not the only one staring at these violations, and she said he was "supposed to do that". 
The kitchen is a mess, the floor is a mess, the restaurant is a mess. 
This is really pretty disgusting...I wouldn't eat here if I were you. I know I'm not going to.
Generally I love Fatburger, HOWEVER, STAY AWAY from this location! Staff did not even ask me how I want my burger cooked, it came dry and tasteless! I will NOT be going to this Fatburger again.

We Went to see Nashville unplugged a country concert and then went to eat at Fatburger, the burger was okay, but we got fries that was cold and 2 drinks  the bill was over $30 for 2 burgers for what we got and the price was charged it is not worth it and we will not be back!

They took forever & messed up all our orders! 
Thanks guys you have terrible service.

I have to say it is the average Fatburger experience. The staff is friendly and eager to please. This one is not so busy as the other locations around Las Vegas. It has plenty of easy parking. The lot is also easy to get in and out of.

Like other Fatburger locations if your in a hurry I find it better to call ahead or order on-line unless your with someone who's company you enjoy. They don't cook the burgers until they are ordered so the wait can be a monotonous if there is a line of people.

I like my Fatburgers cut in half and my fries well-done.

Good burgers with a nice list of add-ons. Although the price of each add-on is rather punitive. A $8 burger becomes a $12 burger with snap of a finger. Secondly, a previous review mentioned this and it's true-the buns fall apart way too easy!  If you're going put the kitchen sink on a burger then you better have buns to withstand the load.
Listen I just had a great burger and every time I go to fat burger it's a great burger so do yourself a favor go in there get the burger with an egg on it one of the best burgers in town

This place is beyond fucken ridiculous. I just paid $30 for two burgers one drink one fries and one Mille shake!!! Who in the fuck charges this muchZ this place is always dead. This is the first and last time I'm eating here! I can't believe this/ this place isn't even high quality or fancy. It's a fucken hamburger stand. Ridiculous! I hope corporate sees this and makes changes. You guys don't even offer ac in this damn restaurant. It's so hot and stale in here. You have workers who can't even explain their receipts! It's fucken pathetic. I will never ever eat here again. I feel like trashing this place for how expensive it wants to charge for two damn burgers!!!!!

Wow! Just woooow!! We decided to try this place out....Boy, do we regret it! We should of known better once we entered. The odor of sewer through out this place is ridiculous!! No freakin A/C during summer is INCREDIBLE! But anyways, we still ordered our food... I know it's called Fatburger for a reason but seriously, those burgers were greasy AF'! Over exaggerated greasy.  Not only were they greasy but does it really take 35 minutes to make our food? I mean I understand making it fresh and all but that's pretty ridiculous. Health Department needs to come down here and check this place out. I didn't even finish my burger and fries. I really tried to give y'all a chance...never again will I step a foot in this place. I was completely disgusted.
It is the place I go for burgers.  Fatburgers.  The shakes and fries simply tidy the meal up in my opinion.  :)

I gave a bad feed back because the dinning are and tables are always dirty. Salt and pepper shaker and discusting all covered with black gums till the new management took over. Guess what not a thing changed and didn't take long same disgusting place to eat. The cooking are you can see over the counter is dirty as it can get. You will run out of you see it. Just walk up to cooking area and see it through glass....Never again..!!! Move along to better and cleaner place to eat. In & out is your better choice and not too far.
Food is not bad but don't try to go into the restrooms and wash ur hands it's absolutely disgusting! Other than that everything thing else is average.
I'd love to give them a great review but their website said they're open until 1:30 a.m. I went at 1:15 a.m. & they were closed. They probably should update their website.

The last time I went to this Fat Burger was not a favorable experience. I decided to give them another shot which was a HUGE mistake. First the place smelled really bad when I went inside... I should have walked out then!! Never did get my order as I waited 10 minutes which is normally not a big deal. However, when I went to inquiry the person at the register was incredibly rude and said they did not know when my order would be ready. At that point I walked out.. would rather lose out on my $14 than put up with that behavior.
Oh did I mention it was a little after 1:00 pm and there was one other couple in the entire dining area. I think that says something. Never again!!!

Fatburger is definitely not the first place that comes to mind when I want to run and grab a quick burger. I have had the selections of burgers in the past and it's always just left me with that "meh" experience. I do though think that the chili cheese fries that they make here are beyond delicious! I thought I would treat myself this past weekend to this 1 million calorie side item since I've been doing so good on eating healthy. This location was in the area I was in so I thought why not drive on thru...or wait there is no drive thru? Awkward. I hate getting out of my car sometimes but I thought why not create a calorie deficit and walk from the parking lot to the door.. Kidding. I walked in and a god awful smell of maybe like an old mop and dirty water/the sewer system failed smell. Yikes. At this point I questioned whether or not I should even proceed with my order. I looked around and everything appeared clean so whatever ordered them good ole chili cheese fries with the steak fries as the fry choice. Total wait time was approximately 10 minutes which was fine because after all I did request that everything be made fresh! At this time it appeared only 2 employees were working, 1 who was full time just in the kitchen on the grill and the other who took orders and helped also in the kitchen. Everything overall was okay and my fries were BOMB I just need that smell, whatever it was to not like ever happen again! Thanks :-)

I'm so surprised at how low the rating is for this location. I've always had great experiences here and the staff is very friendly! The restaurant is clean and the atmosphere is fun. I admit the burgers are pretty pricey (my husband and I can easily spend $25 for both of our meals), but the food is delicious!

Let me start out by saying that I Freaking Love Fat Burger! seriously they make my favorite burger in Las Vegas I used to come here at least 4-5 times a month. I get a large with cheddar cheese and bacon. there sweet potato fries are great as well and who can complain about Haagen-Dazs ice cream milk shake? not me.
I am just sad that the last few times i have come in I have had to eat outside because the whole inside smells like a bad sewer. Im not just talking about, oh someone made a big stinky a while ago i mean my burger might have some sort of a poop smell. It was so bad the other day that I had to leave before I even ordered. I really hope they can fix this problem being that I love this place and it is the closest to my house. maybe a suggestion would be to have someone put some soap and water down some of the drain hatches weekly. That works at my business building. just a thought.. until then I will have to go to another location.

We stopped in here today for lunch. Definitely not the best dining experience we've ever had.

First of all the young girl taking our order seemed very bored with her job. No enthusiasm at all.

We both ordered a burger and fries with a drink. I assumed they'd give us our drink cups at the counter. When they didn't I assumed our drink cups would be brought to us at the table. They weren't. We went back up to the counter to get our cups.

There was some smell emanating from the restroom that smelled like spoiled air freshener if there is such a thing. My girlfriend said it was almost overpowering in the restroom. It was a really sickly sweet smell. I'm not sure what it was but it didn't make the burgers taste any better.

Here it is several hours later and I'm a little bit queasy. Not sure if it was the burger, but I haven't eaten anything else today. 

If it comes back up I'll change my review to a 1 for now I'll stick with my 2 star review.

A regular cheeseburger, regular fries, and regular soda for $12.50?!

First, I have to acknowledge the cashier, Shanae.  She was excellent.  Helpful and outgoing to everybody in the restaurant.  I was so impressed with her service that I looked on my receipt for her name.  

The cheeseburger is good.  The fries were decent but not worth $2.99.

I've been frequenting this location for sometime now and I've never experienced anything but great service and food here. Staff is quick here and food is ready in a reasonable amount of time. In my opinion these burgers beat smash burger and in n out by far.

I gave it a shot because I use to love fat burger. It was the only place I could get a child burger in Vegas years ago. I was starving so, here I am. They don't take the on line coupons here. Its $30 for me and my kid. The food is not the Fat Burger I've had in the past. The burger is super greasy and the fat fries are hot but, soggy almost as if they were microwaved. 

I'm eating and all I smell it a dirty bathroom. How can I eat when I smell sewer. I'm disgusted. I'm not eating I'm leaving. 

I'm never coming here again. The smell is overwhelming!!!!

I'll go to Tommy's and get a real Cali style chili burger and not smell shit!! Never coming here again

The burgers have great flavor! 
We ordered burgers that were quite modified and everything came out exactly like we ordered it. We didn't have to wait too long for the food :) 

The customer service here was good. They were friendly.

One of the few fast food chains that offers a veggie burger option. They use the Boca patty which is not my favorite. 

Pros
-Staff is friendly
-Offer a veggie burger, turkey burger
-Skinny Fries (not diet food but they are cut thinner than steak fries)

Cons
-Burgers don't taste that good. My veggie burger was very very lackluster and my friend's beef patty was apparently not a home run either
- Price : 11 dollars for a fast food  meal (burger, fries, coke)
- Not really fast food if it takes 10 min to get the food

It's going to be a long time before I go to FatBurger again. Not impressive but edible.

Don't go to this Fatburger unless you're prepared to endure disappointment after disappointment. 

It began with ordering our food. My mom ordered a burger without the bun, which isn't anything outrageous these days, but for the woman taking our order, she had to go back and get the manager to assist her in completing the rest of our order. In total, we were up at the counter for over five minutes. 

After ordering, we sat down and waited...and waited...annnnd waited...annnnnnnnd waited. I'm not exaggerating when I say we waited 20 minutes for our order of three burgers and two fries to arrive at the table. And it's not like the place was packed; we were the only people there, other than a party of five that walked in about ten minutes after we arrived. 

Once the food arrived, the manager apologized as one of our burgers was incorrect, but we didn't really feel like waiting an additional 20 minutes for a new one. There was definitely some temperature consistency issues as well, since our food was hardly warm by the time it arrived, most notably the fries. 

After bringing us our food, the manage went outside to smoke, as she was sitting right outside the window next to our booth. Another large party walked inside and started ordering. Once again becoming frustrated with the ordering system, the same employee who originally took our order when to the door and shouted to the manager "Get your ass back in here!" 

Overall, I don't mind Fatburger for its food, it's okay for what it is, but I probably won't be back at this specific location. The entire experience was unpleasant from the get-go.

Burgers are good.  But really thin patties.   Really not much meat at all.  As with most places you get way more bread and bun then meat.   If your carb conscious opt for lettuce  instead.    They do have some killer shakes though

I am a big fan of Fat Burger. LOL I was craving it and I got there at 9:27 at night. I looked it up online and made sure they closed at ten. When I got there they had the open sign still on and the doors locked. They just starred at me as I shook the door handle. I was pretty disappointed. The next day I still wanted to eat there. I went there during the daytime. The staff is a mess. They are so unprofessional everyone is running around, laughing and playing. So many people backed up waiting on their food. I couldn't even figure out who was managing the place. I don't think I'll be eating at this location any longer.

Seriously have no idea why people think this is even remotely a decent burger.  For fast food give me In n Out or nothing.  This burger is boring, no flavor at all, no seasoning no chargrill.  Average.  Would rather be Tom Hanks in Castaway and eat a crab that is still living.

One star for the poor customer service. I get it's fast food, but our table was dirty and the place smelled like sewer. They advertise buy one get one on Tuesdays but don't specify anything about the burger. Our food was good, just wish the customer service was up to the same standard

I ate here probably two to three times a week- veggie burgers only- to the point where the people know my order: last night I tried to order online at around 9:15. After a bit of technical preparation, the site said, 'this restaurant not available online- please call.' I called to order a veggie burger- ahead of time so that it was most convenient for me & the workers. Someone speaking almost no English answered. I said I wanted to order- he asked someone: 'Do you want to  take an order?' She said, 'no,' then came to the phone. I started to order- she said, 'will you be here within ten minutes?' (I would have been). 'Because it's 9:42 & we're not supposed to take phone orders.' 'Its 9:36 & you close at 10.' 'We go by the work clock, which says 9:42.' Are you kidding me? You go by a fantasy time about when you prepare to be closed? (I didn't say this- I thought this). I hung up - wrote a letter to corporate & I vow to take my business elsewhere. Where is pride in serving customers? By the way, this is the second time this branch closed early. They have deterred a great customer!
Love me a fatburger! And a fatburger at Fatburger is even better...Fresh made, has that kind of diner style element to it. It's good stuff!

I seriously question the credibility of many of the reviews, the place can't possibly be dirty if there are no customers. Having said that. I ordered 1 large burger at a cost of $8+, and it was not worth it on any measure. From my perspective, this will be a franchise purchase that will not end well.  If the manager would be so kind as to contact me and reimburse me for the cost of my burger, I would be most appreciative.

Many fond memories of the burgers at the Sunset location; this location bears no resemblance.

Avoid.

For some reason I'm on a Fatburger kick lately.  I was in the area, so I stopped by and ordered a Large Fatburger with Cheese and Skinny Fries. 
http://www.yelp.com/biz_photos/5jTmjxb1X34EfcY1gos4tw?select=GHXXu6KUhAB1WgvXVovFBg
http://www.yelp.com/biz_photos/5jTmjxb1X34EfcY1gos4tw?select=nuXk9K_k26TXuwTqscisEA
I like this location because the restaurant is always clean and there are plenty of seats and tables.

The food took a while to come out.....it's Fatburger after all.  The Fatburger was very good, as usual, and the Fries were cooked just right.  I couldn't finish the order of Fries, next time I'll pass.  Solid 4 Stars ()

Return Factor - 90%

I love this burger they always make it perfect every time I go there I come after work every day almost every other day and the people over there know my name Great customer service  juicy burger. What more can you ask for I love fat burger

I'm writing this review as I just sat down to eat, I was craving a turkey burger, so I thought this would do the trick. So I order, and go to wash my hands, this bathroom was so disgusting, I've been in cleaner gas stations than this. Graffiti on the diaper changer thing, the floor was repulsive and I won't even speak about the toilet. As I come out to find a table, I notice all the tables are dirty, and the seats. I'm starting to lose my appetite. Since the grill is open I'm trying to asses the situation behind the counter to see how dirty things are. Should I stay or should I go now? Ask for my money back and leave? Ugh decisions. 

I decide what doesn't kill you makes you stronger (I was really hungry) and I gave the turkey burger a try. Was pretty tasty.   

The ambiance, not so much, between the thoughts of a dirty restaurant, and the guy behind the counter making burgers singing mariachi music, and the day workers in the home depot parking lot, I'm positive I won't be coming back here.

We come here about twice a month. It's always clean and not overly packed like some of the other ones. I do wish they had a drive thru though, but I understand why they don't. Everything is cooked to order, so it's fresh all the time. And I love the fact that they have a jukebox.

The food is just ok.
The burgers are really salty & greasy. Other than the salt, there is no flavor.
The fries are salty too.
On the plus side, the service is good. The employees walk by & ask you how is everything.

Went tonight after going to this location tons of times. Always consistant. Tonight they were poorly staffed with only three people working and two of them on their first day. The woman who took our order was missing at least two teeth. It was disgusting. I cant believe they would have her greet people. She did not look sanitary at all. My husband got the XXL which he always gets. It was off. They loaded it with mayo. They never do that. He heard them ask what the order of condiments was supposed to be when she was making the burger. She also complained loudly that it was too hot! Just make our burger and quit bitching loudly. it was really off tonight.

Worst of worst fatburger
Poor services dirty restaurant
I was looking for clean tables for few minuts
No kachup no toilet paper 
It took 20 min to cooked two buger and fries
Also my fries was cold and tast like deepfried twice 
Bad managment looks owner dont take care restaurant 
Employees are too lazy to work

I love Fatburger and this location is one of the better and bigger ones in town. The dining area is really big so there are always comfy tables or booths. And the rocking jukebox is FREE so play some tunes while you eat. 

I usually get an XXL (double cheeseburger) with grilled onions, pickles and all-beef chili. I'm a low carber so I'll get it served in a dish with no bun. I love the beef here and I love how it is cooked in all of its own delicious burger grease. Sit at the counter and talk to the cooks while they prepare your dinner, and order a soda that you can keep refilling yourself at the self-service soda bar (this location has Coke Zero and Gold Peak brewed tea, both make my tummy happy). 

I love Fatburger's handmade milkshakes too (and their skinny and fat fries) but I've had to give those up due to all the carbs. But if you can, try their skinny chili cheese fries, they are the best. They melt shredded cheddar on them which is the key to good cheese fries. There are also a long list of possible toppings you can get on your Fatburger from relish to fried eggs to bacon and grilled onions. They also make grilled chicken and veggie burgers too, and both are good. You can also get your burger on a whole wheat bun or wrapped in lettuce.

Everything is cooked to order here so once you order you are given a number. They'll deliver the food to your table. Plan on spending about $25 for 2 people; it's not exactly cheap but it's convenient and the food is always fresh, hot, and served with a smile. The bathrooms are usually pretty clean here too, and they have FREE wi-fi so you can work through lunch.

Not very well maintained.  No soap or paper towels in the restroom, there was not even a soap dispenser.  But... there was a sign saying employees must wash hands before returning to work.  I'm not sure how they will manage to do that. Also, literally ever napkin holder every table was empty.  If these obvious things are over looked, it makes me wonder what corners are cut behind the scenes. Go to another location if you can help it.

Avoid this location!

30 minutes to mess up an order of 1 burger and fries, nothing else. Worst Fatburger location this side of town. The employees are slow. The food is always cold. Avoid this location and make the trek to Red Rock Casino for a $1 extra for everything if you really need to have Fatburger. Done with this place. I would be firing the whole staff if I was in charge of this loss leader.

This place is amazing! The customer service is outstanding. Shout out to Carlos! I asked if it was possible to use coke instead of milk to make a blended coke float and when I found out they don't usually do this I said it was ok I'd just take a soda. But Carlos said "No let's give it a try". And yes...it came out great! He also realized I was ordering a hamburger patty for my fur baby and remembered to leave off the salt when I had forgotten to request no salt. I wish I knew the name of the young lady that actually made the shake and the cook that came out to bring me my food. He showed me a picture of his pet ( a snake...eek...lol ) when I showed him a picture of my fur daughter, Luna. Of course the food was great also, even Lulu said so . This was a wonderful experience and I will definitely be back. Y'all give them a try!

Fatburger and breakfast? I never really saw myself eating here on a lazy Sunday morning, but a quick and casual breakfast craving brought me here. Plus, seeing that breakfast is served all-day, I can see a breakfast fanatic (me) frequenting this place on more than one occasion.

Don't come here expecting extravagance. You get your typical breakfast sandwich: a bun packed with a sausage patty, cheese, and a fried egg on the bottom. The fried egg was a nice touch, which gave it more a homemade taste that you don't get in most major fast food joints. It's not a gigantic sandwich, but it's a good enough size to get my fill. Although it doesn't specify in the menu, the sandwich comes with a side of tater tots too.. score!

I'd skip out on ordering the OJ. Turns out, it's the bottled concentrated Tropicana stuff. Does not taste fresh squeezed, nor does it taste fresh. Reminds me of the sour OJ sipping sessions during depressing hospital visits. Definitely gonna roll with a coffee on the next visit.

Prices more than reasonable for the breakfast menu. I got my sandwich, tater tots, and OJ all for under $5. I end up spending almost twice that much getting something off the regular menu.

P.S. - Free Wi-Fi is offered here!

I love fat burgers but last time my families order was not right and ever time it gets dirtier and dirtier.  It is so unclean that I stopped going.  For example, go to a smash burger on Sahara and compare the inside and the cleanliness.  I like the taste of FB better but I don't want to eat some place that is dirty.  Imaging what the kitchen, that we don't see, is like.

Wow, terrible costumer service. Called to place an order for pick up. Young lady answers, tells me to hold on. So, I stay on the phone for 5 minutes while I hear chatter in the background that had nothing to do with being busy. Then I heard someone finally pick up the phone and hang it up without even checking to see if someone was on the line. So, I went across the street to 5 guys instead and will from now.
First off, the food is always great. It's so good. But what made this experience wonderful is JAMIE. She was very nice and professional. Made our dinner well worth it

Ordered 4 med burgers with cheese, fat fries, onion rings and 4 drinks.  Priced was about $40 which was not bad for a burger joint that is made to ordered. 
we figured it would be a long wait but didn't realize it would be 20 plus minutes.  However after reading all the reviews we knew it was worth the wait.  Burger came out and it was dry, nothing like the other reviews where others said it was juicy.  Huge disappointment!

2 stars since the onion rings and fat fries we decent.

I've been to other Fatburger's in the valley and this one is by far the worst. 

Came in here at 5:50pm to order two burgers to go, one medium and one large, with cheese and no tomatoes, and some fries. The cashier was very nice, however don't be fooled, a nice face does not mean a sense of urgency. My order was punched in at 5:59, and since I know the burgers are make to order, I expected the food to be out in about ten minutes.

Wrong. The female cashier and the male cook had absolutely no teamwork whatsoever. They were all over the place and were literally falling apart, with only 4-5 orders on the screen. There was food just sitting under the heat lamp for a good ten minutes before she decided to grab it and hand it off. At the 20 minute mark, I was getting impatient, because an elderly woman got her order (two burgers) before me, and she ordered after me. I politely asked where my food was, and the cook said it was coming right up, and that if I had a complaint, it wasn't their fault because they were short handed. 

That's a load of BS in my opinion. I manage a high volume restaurant and any competent staff can handle multiple orders, ESPECIALLY when the whole menu is essentially burgers and fries. Even with two people, with proper teamwork, sense of urgency, and a sense of priority, they should be able to handle a work load, especially since it is what they are trained to do. 

6:34 comes around and I finally get my food, along with one other woman that was waiting for her orders to come out, which had a long ticket time as well. The cashier went up to me and said if I came in next time and said they botched my food, I would get a replacement. I don't want a replacement. I want to go into a food establishment, and get my order within a reasonable time period. 30 minutes is not acceptable ticket time for two burgers that weren't even made properly. 

Other locations are good, just this one needs some serious improvement.

I showed up here after work to get a burger and fries on Saturday night at 410am. The posted hours on the door read open until 5. The employees inside locked the door, then proceeded to laugh and ignore me. Unprofessional, and infuriating.

Overall good place to eat. I been to this location about 5 times now and it's good to decent. That restaurant itself isn't the cleanest. The bathroom is very old, the restaurant is kinda old now that I think about it. 

Fatburger gets very expensive well. Two people getting a 5 oz burger cost around 20-25 bucks! (Adding fries & a drink). Too much in my opinion. 

However, the food is good, and the shakes are very good. That is the main reason in why I like Fatburger. The customer service is good as well. This place is a three star overall I can't see it being more than that.

Love me some Fatburger, but disappointed this evening by the shops dirty appearance, along with the fact they were out of root beer, and when asked to substitute a turkey patty for a hamburger patty on a mushroom burger, it just proved too difficult for the counter staff to comprehend.

I enjoy coming to this location, but when you arrive and there is only one other customer in the shop you would expect for the shop to be spotless or at least the staff working towards that goal.

The restrooms are a completely separate conversation as they are filthy, and I wonder how they pass health inspections? Once you go in, you wonder how you are going to exit the space without catching something.  Urinal has been covered for weeks.  What does it take to clean a window or door??

Took forever for the food. Very hot inside restaurant. Turkey burger was tasteless and disgusting, I didn't finish it. Kids burger wasn't much better,my child didn't eat it all either. Onion rings were gross also. Very pricey for the food we got. Not going back yuck.

Gave 1 star because the guy on staff that took our order was nice, polite and smiled a lot ..Cost $30 for 2 of the smallest cheeseburger meals. Floors were sticky all over the store. Tables not. Leaned. Bathroom was in terrible Gross shape. Soda machine was out of syrup. Napkin dispensers were empty... the 7 employees I saw were all hanging out in the back by the cook. Not once did any of them come out to the lobby to clean up or do anything that resembled work. Got our food and the buns were so old I literally checked for mold... all on a slow Sunday afternoon. No leadership. Can't imagine how dirty the kitchen is since the soda machine looks like it hasn't been cleaned in over a year.. just bad.. could have spent literally half the amount somewhere else and not had to worry if I was going to get e-coli poisoning.. #nevergoback

I really like coming here. The food is always good and consistant. Its made right in front of you while you wait. It takes a few minutes, but is worth it. The staff is always friendly as well. We had more than exceptional service this evening from Natalie and will be back!
The place was clean.  The staff was nice.  I wasn't paying $12 for a burger combo.  Got a small burger ala cart for $5.  It was four bites.  See ya never.  Plenty of other burger joints everywhere.

FAT BURGER CORPORATE ALERT: BRAND BEING TARNISHED! Ive loved Fat Burger since the first day I enjoyed their turkey burger with egg and Mr Pibb. This is the only Fat Burger I've seen look this bad.Do not think this is how all Fat Burgers are operated. Everyone I've been to was nearly perfect.  What happened to corporate quality control? Neon sign broke, dirt building up from neglect, no one greeted me and manager rushed order, TV broke playing nonsense. Trays of old food sitting out, chairs, straw wrappers, and other stuff all over while employees walking by with no care to clean it up. Only the manager and lady working not sure but looks like they are trying to save money but its going to end up costing them customers. Food was good but more care could have been put into stalking the burger so it was even.  It's sad they don't care anymore...

My girlfriend is a fan of Fatburger, so I decided to go to this location to surprise her with some food. I quickly discovered, however, that Fatburger, this location in particular, is a very mixed bag.

First and foremost, the biggest flaw: NO DRIVE-THRU WINDOW. In this day and age, I didn't think they were still making fast food restaurants that required you to get out of your car. It doesn't take a rocket scientist to know that this is a big mistake.

Secondly, the service is very hit and miss. One time I asked for the thin/skinny fries, and they put the larger steak fries in my bag anyway (which if you ask me, aren't as good.) One time they tried taking my order when they weren't even standing at the register, and needless to say I wound up repeating it several times. 

Another thing that is really weird about this location is their jukebox. It brags about free music, yet the LCD appears to be covered up. On top of that, it even has money/credit card slots. Seriously? Having access to free music would be a great way to kill time while waiting for my order, but it looks to me like this damn thing doesn't even work.

And another big flaw.... the PRICES. For a medium burger and a small  order of fries, its TEN DOLLARS. And this is WITHOUT A DRINK! The food at Fatburger is excellent, and I believe they would be justified in asking slightly more for their items.... but this is ridiculous.

If you MUST eat at a Fatburger, go to one with a drive-through - and be prepared to pay more than you might want to. This is a place that has the potential to be great, but this one needs a drive-thru, improved service, and lowered prices before I give them anything above 2/5.

This is a tricky review to write as I do enjoy Fatburger products but the service is inconsistent. Often times they forget to add the extras that you order for your burger. On several occasions I have ordered bacon on my burger and have gotten home to discover no bacon was ever added. About half of the time something is wrong. The staff is friendly and helpful but many of them are not properly trained. Often the credit/debit machine is out of order. Compared with In-N-Out Burger the wait time is very long. Sometimes I have had to wait 20 to 30 minutes for one burger, not to mention that the store wasn't even crowded! I would hate to see what would happen if a lunch crowd came in. 2 Stars.

This is the dirtiest Fat burger I've been to.   We walked in 40 mins after opening and all the tables were dirty.   Walking up to order the person working was chewing food and the two homeless guys in the booth when walking in....didn't help this review.   We had to clean our own table!!!   Food was normal

This is around the corner from a Five Guys, but we went here because they have Maui Banana shakes.  Don't ask me what's in it, we tried to figure it out (Sure we could have asked, but yana.....).  Definitely banana, and some other kind of "exotic" flavoring like a hint of coconut or mango or something.  I was hoping for something along the lines of a Sonic pineappple milkshake (BOMB, btw), but it wasn't.

You get your choice of skinny or steak fries.  I got the skinny, and noticed they have an extra coating of crustiness, like Burger King or McD's.  I like them better than In 'N Out fries, although I worry about what makes up that extra coating.

I asked them if they could do a 'protein style' burger without the bun, and they were happy to do so.  They basically put the patty on top of all the fixin's, and put the whole thing in a cardboard container (like the fry containers at In 'N Out).  

I like that they have different Tabasco sauces for you to choose from too, and saw a bottle of A-1 Steak Sauce on the counter too.

This place wasn't busy, maybe because of Five Guys.  But fine with me, I'll go back to this place.

Oh, and they have free wifi.

I am usually a fan of Fatburger, but the location on Fort Apache is absolutely the worst. On a Sunday afternoon with no one in the restaurant it took us half an hour to get our cheeseburgers and fries. The staff was incompetent and is a negative reflection on the company as a whole.

This isn't the best Fatburger in the world... I've been here a handful of times and it usually takes a bit too long to get your order. The burgers are a bit too salty for my taste too. On the other hand they have FANTASTIC real milkshakes and are open til like 3 AM. If I'm looking for a better burger I'll either grill it myself or drive down the street to Fuddruckers.

I know, I know... I'm supposed to keep my food consumption controlled if I am to either lose some of this weight or maintain.  I couldn't help but try out Fatburger again after the whole discussion between In&Out and Fatburger.  I wanted to make sure that my choice between the two were correct.  And, hands down I will choose In&Out over Fatburger.  Sorry Fatburger fans.

I chose this location just because of convenience.  What I like about Fatburger is the fact they take call ins, the patties are fatter and thicker, and the choice to have an egg in your burger is available.  Mmmm, such a delight to have egg in a burger.

Downfalls are that the meat is somewhat hard and dry, the relish on the burger doesn't do anything for my pallet, and the taste just doesn't do it for me.  There's just something missing.  I thought the onion rings were good but all that oil just lost me.  

Staff were great and awesome.  Lady calling out names when the order is up seems cheerful and willing to go above and beyond.  I liked her enthusiasm.  :D

I would rate this place 2.5 stars. food was delish, but service sucks balls. 

We went here for dinner on Friday night, a quick stop for "fast food" on the way to the airport.  Is Fat Burger fast food? because this place was anything but fast!

There were 4 people working, 1 cashier and 3 ppl prepping food. It took 15-20 minutes for our order (2 burgers, shake, drink, fat fries) to come out.  The server brought us our food and I asked "will my shake be coming out?" and the chick gave me a blank stare and walked away muttering "I don't even know what's going on."  Really?!  Did I just witness that?  My shake came out...5 minutes later.  My burger with cheese and chopped up bacon was bomb-tastic btw. So freakin good.  Too bad the service here sucks though.

Called them to see if they were open and the guy said yes. I said great I will call you back with an order to go. Called back 3 minutes later and went to voicemail. Waited a few more minutes and called again still went to voicemail. So I called from my husband's phone and wouldn't you know, they answered. I said I was calling to place an order and the guy straight up hung up on me. Can't tell you how much I love Fatburger, but this definitely pissed me off. Definitely not going back. Called 5 guys across the street, 10 minutes before closing and they happily took my order and had a smile on their faces. Love spending my money on places that deserve it! Bye bye Fatburger.

I'm an East Coaster and don't understand or care for In n Out.  I do however enjoy Fatburger.  I can choose my size and customize- I'm all about that option.  My staple, medium, sauted onions, mushrooms, Swiss and NO mustard and NO mayo here- ketchup only please!  Their shakes are always undeniably tasty! I go for the lasted limited edition shake;). The staff here is always friendly and all have a smile on their faces and make sure you enjoy what you ordered!  
Please tip them and wait, wait and listen;)

Had a Groupon for 2 cheeseburger combos. Asked to sub one with turkey patty as I don't eat beef. While the beef and turkey burgers are the same price on the menu, we would have been willing to pay a bit of an up charge if necessary. The worker had to call someone who said no. Bad mistake. We left and won't be coming back.

I usually don't leave such negative reviews, but this place SUCKS!!! They close early, have NO interest in customer service, are WAY overpriced and are just an overall underwhelming & negative experience... I'll never return here again... In & Out Burgers are less expensive, faster & tastier... How does this Fatburger stay in business?!?

Usually we really enjoy eating at Fatburger.  The last two visits have left us disappointed....The place is not crowded and yet our food comes out warm.  No excuse when ours is the only order being made.  Tonight not only were the burgers just warm, they were extremely salty and even the fries were not the usual piping hot.  Not sure why the quality is going down, but we will be trying other burger places for a while.

Disgusting, and miserable. The first two things that come to mind. Girl Stromee rolled her eyes when she had to stop to help us. Another girl who walked in whose shift was just started had two cigarettes hanging out of her mouth when she walked passed. She went past the grill and to the back. Just filthy. I can definitely tell we aren't in California anymore...

Stopped in with the mom to grab a quick dinner. The place was a ghost town. Not complaining. It was a Sunday and it meant quick and speedy service. I think we all know how long you can wait for a Fatburger to be cooked when the place is packed!

Anyway, I got the veggie burger and mom got the regular. Both were pretty good and the fries were awesome! Best fries I've had from a fast food chain to date. I say this because it had been YEARS since I've eaten at Fatburger, let alone ordered their fries because the burger always seemed to be enough. I was starving this day! lol!

Staff was very friendly and the cashier working that day was pretty darn cute, I might add. ;)

I recommend. Yup....sure do!

I'm a local and outside of the Fatburger in the Red Rock, this is the closes option. Every time I come here (which isn't often) I'm so disappointed and today I decided to write a review. The cashier was super rude, I paid 18.00 for 2 burgers and fries for my daughter and myself and the lettuce looked days old and my French fries were ice cold. There was no ice in the ice machine and it didn't smell too pleasant. One of the workers tossed his empty juice bottle across the room (I guess trying to make it in the trash) and it fell in the area where the veggies are. (Poor decision on his behalf) needless to say I will not be coming back to this location because even though it was only $18.00, when I spend money I expect better than this. This location gives Fatburger a bad rep.

I've been here a few times tried a veggie burger for the first time and loved it it was juicy not dry and you can add grilled onions to the burger yum yum.  The time that is listed for opening is wrong they actually open at 7:00am.

Omg!  The worst meal ever !  Ordered ahead via phone. Went to pick up and they had no idea about my order. So I reordered at the counter and waited. ALL 3 burgers came out burnt!  Not over cooked burnt with one whole side covered in black char. Really ? They have no idea what they are doing in there. 

The French fries were soggy and the sweet potato fries were covered in salt and pepper and soft. 

Never never never going there again. A waste of $47. Nauseated!
Service was great. Got my food fast, how  I ordered it. Place was clean, even though I ordered to go but I was satisfied

This place make good burgers, hot dogs, and shakes.  It is not cheap there though.  They do give you a ton of options to put on your burger, but some of them you have to pay for and that can add up.  This really isn't fast food.  Its cooked to order and if its busy it could take a while.  They always get my order right, which is a huge plus for me.

I usually have them delivered, which you can do from multiple delivery services, before watching the knights.

This is the absolute worst Fatburger. I was so turned off by my experience here that I have not eaten at a Fatburger since! It is very unfortunate that this location has been allowed to become so run down and mismanaged.

Just finished eating here. service was great, didn't catch the dude's name but the guy who rung me up amd cooked/served my food was cool and seemed liked he took pride in his job. Food was served fairly quick seeing as how the food is made to order and fresh. Burger was big and juicy (I ordered the XXL 1lb burger) the veggies were fresh. The only thing I suggest they do is get heartier buns that can hold up when topped with 16oz of juicy beef (half way thru the bun wasnt sloppy soaked but it was pretty weak) the beef had a great seasoning to it and the fries, which are my favorite kind steak fries (fat fries) were cooked perfectly. It was pretty empty in the building I dont see why but the joint was clean. Overall the service, food, and the fact it took me back 9years since high school when I used to eat fat burger every other week this place scores a solid 5

Not too many good Fat Burgers left around Vegas. This one is still decent. We only opt for burgers and fat fries/onion rings. Couldn't speak for the rest of the menu. Staff is hit or miss but good as of now. Pamela is nice and efficient.
